videos.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once (2022)
videos.description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.
videos.additional_info:
Everything Everywhere All at Once (2022)
A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.
Technique - Anthropo
Director - Daniel Kwan, Daniel Scheinert
DOP - Larkin Seiple
Editor - Paul Rogers
Colorist - Alex Bickel

videos.alt_text: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid
videos.title: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
videos.description: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
videos.additional_info:
Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
A mesmerizing music video featuring a chaotic journey initiated by Diplo's spiked chicken nugget, showcasing wild camera angles, unusual characters, and intense visual effects set in a quirky vintage Chinese restaurant. Director Seaman's close collaboration with Francis ensures a deep connection with the song's rhythms and lyrics, bringing to life a vividly demented world that captivates viewers, with or without the influence of LSD.
Technique - Anthropo , Talking animal
Director - Parker Seaman
DOP - Franklin Ricart
Editor - Jacob Ehrlich
Colorist - Josh Bohoskey
Original Source - Link
DINNER
FOOD
FISH
ACID

videos.title: Apple - Miss You (2023)
videos.description: An electrical outlet yearns to reconnect with the iPhone. But the outlet is left desolate thanks to the now longer lasting battery life of the iPhone 15 Plus.
videos.additional_info:
